materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Mahaweli Ganga River in Kandy, Sri Lanka. There is thick vegetation on either side of the river. The photograph shows the river at low tide. There is a man swimming in the river in the middle of the photograph, with a small boat behind him. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java River Mahawelligunga at Peridenia, Kandy, Ceylon
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Kandy (Sri Lanka) Mahaweli River (Sri Lanka)
